languages.text: "Пролитая кровь благородных господ — большое несчастье. Однако суровое решение Лорд-капитана надолго отобьет у этих бесчестных интриганов желание вредить верным слугам Лорд-капитана".

traits.locale_text: "Пролитая кровь благородных господ — большое несчастье. Однако суровое решение Лорд-капитана надолго отобъет у этих бесчестных интриганов желание вредить верным слугам Лорд-капитана".

languages.text: "The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."
languages.original_text: "Пролитая кровь благородных господ — большое несчастье. Однако суровое решение Лорд-капитана надолго отобьет у этих бесчестных интриганов желание вредить верным слугам Лорд-капитана".

traits.locale_text: "The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."

"The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."

languages.text: «La sangre derramada de los nobles es una tragedia. No obstante, la severa justicia de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán evitará que estos conspiradores traicioneros ataquen a los sirvientes leales de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán durante mucho tiempo».
languages.original_text: "The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."

languages.text: 「貴族の血が流されるというのは大きな不幸だわ。けれど、ロード・キャプテンの厳しいジャッジメントは、この不敬な陰謀家どもが、今後長期にわたってロード・キャプテンの忠実なる従者たちに危害を与えなくする抑止剤となることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."

languages.text: “让贵族阶级流血是件非常不幸的事情。不过，舰长大人严厉的判决会震慑住那些无耻的阴谋分子。在接下来很长一段时间，他们都不会再敢伤害舰长大人忠诚的仆人。”
languages.original_text: "The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."

languages.text: "Das vergossene Blut edler Lords ist ein großes Unglück. Allerdings wird das harte Urteil des Lord Captains diese ehrlosen Intriganten davon abhalten, den loyalen Dienern des Lord Captains auf absehbare Zeit Schaden zuzufügen."
languages.original_text: "The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."

languages.text: « Répandre le sang des nobles est un grand malheur. Néanmoins, le jugement sévère {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} dissuadera ces conspirateurs sans honneur de nuire à ses fidèles serviteurs. »
languages.original_text: "The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."

"The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."

languages.text: "Soylu lordların kanlarının dökülmesi ziyadesiyle talihsiz oldu. Ancak Lord Kaptan'ın sert hükmü, bu onursuz komplocuları Lord Kaptan'ın sadık hizmetkârlarına zarar vermekten uzunca bir süre alıkoyacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The spilt blood of noble lords is a great misfortune. However, the Lord Captain's harsh judgement will deter these dishonourable schemers from harming the Lord Captain's loyal servants for a long time to come."
